label: usedChemical
comment: A chemical used during this applied chemical treatment.
A distinct chemical used for this specified chemical treatment.
A distinct chemical used for this specified material.

rangeIncludes.comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

domainIncludes.comment: A process of applying a chemical, physical, or biological agent to an object.
Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
